featured.text: Joseph’s behavior is so unpredictable that no one can ______

definition.zh_def: 約瑟夫，一個常見的男性名字，源自希伯來語，意為「上帝將增加」或「上帝會加添」。
definition.en_def: Joseph is a common male given name of Hebrew origin, meaning 'God will increase' or 'God will add.'
definition.example: Joseph is planning to travel to Europe next summer.
